00017 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 // DLLIMPEXP macros
00019 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 
00021 // These are our DLL macros (see the contrib libs like wxPlot)
00022 #ifdef WXMAKINGDLL_THINGS
00023     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_THINGS WXEXPORT
00024     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_THINGS(type) WXEXPORT type
00025 #elif defined(WXUSINGDLL)
00026     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_THINGS WXIMPORT
00027     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_THINGS(type) WXIMPORT type
00028 #else // not making nor using DLL
00029     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_THINGS
00030     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_THINGS(type) type
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // wxWidgets backwards compatibility macros
00035 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 
00037 #include "wx/dynarray.h"
00038 #ifndef WX_DECLARE_OBJARRAY_WITH_DECL // for wx2.4 backwards compatibility
00039     #define WX_DECLARE_OBJARRAY_WITH_DECL(T, name, expmode) WX_DECLARE_USER_EXPORTED_OBJARRAY(T, name, WXDLLIMPEXP_THINGS)
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 #endif  // __WX_THINGDEF_H__
